name: memory – The Original
description:
Original memory® - THE classic from Ravensburger. The app offers four different sets of cards and the unique “My Photos” mode where you can play with your very own photos. So get started, improve your score and climb up the ranks to become the world’s best player!

Four different sets of cards: Classic, Animals, Flags and the recently added Holiday edition!

Additional unique “My Photos” mode: choose from your own photo album on your iPhone or iPad and play the most individual memory® ever!

Single player mode: the better you remember the cards and the faster you solve the puzzles, the higher your score. Start training and beat your own records!

Duel mode: two players compete against each other, by the rules of classic memory®.

Adventure mode: it starts with 2x2 but the number of cards increases in every round – how many can you handle? Now with 50 levels!

Three difficulty settings from beginner to pro player.

Local and global high score lists.

Classic memory® gameplay that brings great fun for the whole family and makes time fly by.
